title: Problem-Solving Ability Enhancement Program Through VR-Based Nursing Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented learning environment utilizing smartphone-based VR simulation tools.

learning_goals: Learners can perform accurate clinical judgments (≥80%) in obstetric and nursing scenarios through VR simulation.
Learners can apply teamwork and communication skills in simulation scenarios to plan emergency interventions within 10 minutes.
Learners can link learned content to real-world clinical cases with ≥70% accuracy in reflective journal entries post-simulation.

resources: VR Nursing Simulation Content (Maternal Care Scenario)
Basic Medical Equipment for Role-Playing (Sphygmomanometer, Stethoscope, etc.)
Smart Device Charging and Management System
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
